channel.title: Posts on Cooper Wallace's DevLog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Cooper Wallace's DevLog

item.title: Research Assistant Weeks 2-4
item.author: cooper.wallace5@gmail.com (Cooper Wallace)
item.description: The past few weeks have been busier than I originally had expected them to be, and my original plan of writing a blog post once per week has changed a bit as you can see. Although that won’t deter me from writing them, so here is my experiences of my second to fourth week working as a Research assistant! During the second week of work, I had a chance to finish up the API that I had written about in my first blog post.

item.title: Summer Research Assistant Week 1
item.author: cooper.wallace5@gmail.com (Cooper Wallace)
item.description: This Summer I was given the chance to join the Computer Science department at Grant MacEwan as a STEP (Summer Temporary Employment Position) Research Assistant. I’m rather excited to be working along side my Professors over the summer, and I can’t wait to see the things that I’ll be working on over the next 4 months! During my first meeting with the departments chair, Cam Macdonell, I had expressed interest in starting a Blog.
